#!/usr/bin/env groovy

pipeline {
	agent {
		docker {
			image 'image:tag'
		}
	}
	stages {
		stage('Initialize') {
			steps {
				sh 'some shell script'
			}
		}

		stage('Lint') {
			steps {
				sh 'some shell script'
			}
		}

		stage('Test') {
			steps {
				sh 'some shell script'
			}
		}

		stage('Build') {
			steps {
				sh 'some shell script'
			}
		}

		stage('Deliver') {
			steps {
				sh 'some shell script'
			}
		}
	}
}
